one_reviews_text: Can't move out of rooms also, using Rift S.  It is not saving when I get something completed.

review_title: I get stuck and cant move/
one_reviews_text: I have gotten to a point where every time I go into a door then back out,  I can not move.  Even if I change the movement type.  No matter what I do I can nOT0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000 move.   I dont know what to do.  I really liked  this game!   I  dont know what do do when I get stuck.   DEVS ! HELP???
Playing on supersampling 1.7 and its verry blurry. Also its not beatifull. Alwash vignet on. Verry lame. Ànd your hands do strange thinks when you pick stuff up. Prettt lame vr adaptio
review_feedback:
Hello wimenels,

Thank-you for your feedback. In order to minimize the impact of the vignette on your play experience, did you try the Movement -> Walk and Rotation -> Point Dial settings? We added object physics impact on the VR hands to give objects in the environment a sense of weight for heightened immersion in the game.

Virtro
